name: Hidden Objects Christmas Magic Celebration Time
name_original: Hidden Objects Christmas Magic Celebration Time
description:
Hidden Objects – Christmas Holiday Magic is a beautifully designed search and finder game with over 30 Winter Holiday levels.

Explore Christmas and Winter scenes by visiting New York City covered in snow, Christmas Tree Farms, Vegas Winter Wonderland, Shopping Malls, Florida’s Sunny Winter Sand Xmas Tree, Santa’s Workshop, European Cities decked in cheer, festive Neighborhoods with decorated Porches, London, Elf, Reindeer & Stockings, Snow Covered Gingerbread Houses, Santa’s Sleigh and more!

Find festive Christmas and Winter themed objects like Santa Claus, Rudolph, Snowmen, Reindeer, Christmas Lights, Stockings, Holly, Wreaths, snow covered Christmas Trees, Elves, Candy, Gingerbread Cookies, Ornaments, Dreidels, Presents, frozen Icicles, Snow Globes and more!

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

Brain Challenging Adventure through Winter season is sure to get you in the festive X-mas spirit!

Hidden Objects – Christmas Holiday Magic features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics reflecting Christmas and frozen Winter themes
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Artistically Crafted Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints


Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
